text: Money is such an amazing teacher: What you choose to do with your money shows whether you are truly powerful or powerless.
author: Suze Orman

text: Having money is rather like being a blond. It is more fun but not vital.
author: Mary Quant

text: People assume I'm out there having this great life, but money doesn't erase the pain. When you're young you barrel through life, making choices without thinking of repercussions. A few years down the line, you wake up in a certain place and wonder how the hell you got there.
author: Jennifer Lopez

text: Money is in some respects life's fire: it is a very excellent servant, but a terrible master.
author: P. T. Barnum

text: It's our money, and we're free to spend it any way we please.
author: Rose Kennedy
